name: Tiny-Tag
description:
TiNY-TAG: is huge!

Well, it's tiny.

Compete in a rather friendly game of TAG with a friend. Your ONLY friend. Where there is ... nothing... else to do.

Run around and jump over each-other; try to escape and run your opponent's timer down to zero to win!

TiNY-TAG is intended to be simple, accessible, and played with your kids!

--------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS: Red - Arrow Keys Blue - WASD

Don't shake their world with SPACEBAR.

Play and Help buttons - Mouse

Entertaining for 20+ seconds!

--------------------------------------------------------------

This is a single screen game using the Ludum Dare 38 theme of "a small world" and although not a jam submission, I followed their rules the days following the compo to get the full LD feel of crunch and fatigue.

*USE TO DECIDE WHO NEEDS TO MAKE THE FOOD RUN*

In the spirit of the jam, All the stuffs (except for my spritefont and itch.io cover image) were created within 48 hours. I went back and spent some extra time making sounds.

THX for playing!

--------------------------------------------------------------

Built in Construct 2.

PyxelEdit, Flash, Bxfr, Text to Speech "Ralph"

[This is also a celebration! Huzzah 1st game page!]
